name: James A. DAVIS v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CITY OF PHILADELPHIA), Petition of City of Philadelphia
name_abbreviation: Davis v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: James A. DAVIS v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CITY OF PHILADELPHIA), Petition of City of Philadelphia.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, and the decision of the Commonwealth Court in this case is REVERSED. See City of Philadelphia v. WCAB (Szparagowski), 831 A.2d 577, 2003 WL 21959994 (Pa. Aug.18, 2003). The Petition for Permission to File Supplement to Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
834 A.2d 504
James A. DAVIS v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CITY OF PHILADELPHIA), Petition of City of Philadelphia.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 16, 2003.
